banner.title: Towards a Bright Future with Knowledge and Learning
banner.description: Safwat Al-Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate outstanding students who can compete with those from top universities. We focus on interactive learning, self-learning, collaborative education, scientific research, and training to strengthen knowledge.

about.title:
Safwat Al-Safwa University
Leadership in Education and Knowledge
about.description: The university is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate outstanding students who can compete with those from top universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, as well as scientific research and training to strengthen knowledge. We offer continuing education for graduates and community members to keep pace with rapid changes and promote self-development.
about.mission_text: To instill good morals and self-confidence, and to provide high-quality education with practical application to graduate distinguished students. To promote creativity, protect human rights, and exchange knowledge with universities and specialized institutions.
about.vision_text: To provide high-quality education with continuous curriculum updates. To offer a stimulating and innovative learning environment focusing on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning. To enhance distance education and academic integration to prepare future leaders.
about.values_text: To strive for excellence in education, promote transparency and accountability, and support scientific research. To encourage active participation, respect data privacy, and foster creative thinking to solve challenges.

benefits.topTitle: Benefits of Studying at the University
benefits.title: At Safwat Al-Safwa University
benefits.description: We provide our students with an integrated educational environment that combines high-quality learning and scientific research.
benefits.useful_education_text: We offer meaningful and practical education, along with sufficient training to succeed in a fast-evolving world.
benefits.self_development_text: Developing oneself through learning critical and creative thinking to solve problems.
benefits.international_certificate_text: Obtaining a globally recognized certificate that opens wide horizons for work and study opportunities.
benefits.job_opportunities_text: Easier access to job opportunities in both the private and public sectors locally and internationally.
benefits.community_contribution_text: Actively contributing to community development through qualified graduates.
benefits.continuous_education_text: We provide continuing education for graduates and individuals in the community to keep pace with rapid changes.

contact.contact_us_description: We are here to help you with any inquiry or request.
contact.subject: Subject

degrees.title: Degrees Awarded by the University
degrees.description: The University Council, based on the recommendation of the College or Institute Council, grants the following degrees:
degrees.diploma_description: An academic degree that qualifies students to work in their chosen professional field.
degrees.bachelor_description: Bachelor’s degree in various academic disciplines.
degrees.specialization_description: A specialized degree in a specific field after earning a bachelor’s degree.
degrees.high_specialization_description: Master’s degree in various disciplines with opportunities for scientific research.
degrees.global_specialization_description: The highest academic degree in a field, involving advanced scientific research.

example_card.welcome_text: Welcome to Safwat Al-Safwa International University, where we strive to provide distinguished education that meets the needs of 21st-century students.

featured_programs.title: Featured Programs
featured_programs.description: Safwat Al-Safwa University offers a selection of distinguished academic programs that combine quality, knowledge, and practical skills to prepare future leaders.
featured_programs.computer_science_desc: A program focused on programming, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity, preparing graduates to lead digital transformation projects.
featured_programs.business_management_desc: A program that integrates modern theories with practical applications to prepare leaders and entrepreneurs ready to compete in the job market.
featured_programs.medical_sciences_desc: A comprehensive program in basic and clinical medical sciences aimed at preparing a distinguished generation in healthcare fields.
featured_programs.environmental_studies_desc: A program focused on sustainability and developing innovative solutions for global and local environmental challenges.
featured_programs.mechanical_engineering_desc: A program that develops research and design skills in energy, manufacturing, and advanced mechanical technologies.
featured_programs.data_analysis_desc: A hands-on training program focusing on data analysis tools, statistics, and artificial intelligence to prepare professionals for the job market.

history.title: Vision, Mission, and Goals
history.description: Safwat Al-Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate outstanding students who can compete with those from leading universities. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, as well as scientific research and training to strengthen knowledge. We offer continuing education for graduates and community members to keep pace with rapid changes, develop self-growth, and enhance competence.
history.founding_2015: Safwat Al-Safwa University was established as one of the leading universities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
history.opening_2018: Opening of the first specialized colleges and launching undergraduate programs in various disciplines.
history.graduate_2020: Launch of postgraduate, master’s, and doctoral programs in multiple fields.
history.expansion_2023: University expansion with new branches and advanced educational programs.
history.mission_text: To instill good morals and self-confidence, and to provide high-quality education with practical application, equipping students with scientific and practical tools before graduation. To foster creativity in developing innovative solutions to current and future challenges, conduct outstanding research contributing to sustainable development, protect human rights, and promote knowledge exchange with universities and specialized institutions.
history.vision_text: To provide high-quality education with continuous curriculum updates to meet scientific progress. To offer continuing education opportunities for graduates and community members to keep up with rapid scientific developments and workforce demands. To create an inspiring and innovative learning environment focused on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative education, promoting Online Learning for flexible access and reduced costs. To ensure horizontal and vertical integration of curricula, adopt a semester system suited to students’ abilities, and conduct applied research to solve present and future challenges. To graduate highly qualified students with clear vision and leadership potential across all university disciplines, while fostering respect, valuing experience, serving the community, preparing future leaders, supporting sustainable development, and strengthening international collaboration.
history.goals_text: To qualify students as specialists in their fields, support scientific research and innovation, enhance knowledge and understanding across disciplines, and contribute to community development.
history.academic_excellence_text: Striving for excellence in education and promoting scientific research.
history.community_participation_text: Actively contributing to community development and preparing future leaders.
history.innovation_text: Encouraging creative thinking to develop practical solutions to challenges.
history.global_vision_text: Collaborating with international universities and specialized institutions.

institutes.title: Institutes
institutes.description: We offer specialized educational and training programs that combine academic knowledge and practical training to develop hands-on skills.
institutes.arabic_language_description: Dedicated to teaching Arabic to non-native speakers through a comprehensive curriculum and modern teaching methods that develop reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills.
institutes.applied_sciences_description: Provides specialized educational and training programs that combine academic knowledge with practical training to help students acquire practical skills and retrain job seekers according to market needs.
arabic_goals: Develop reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills.
Introduce students to Arab and Islamic culture and traditions.
Use modern and advanced teaching methods.
applied_sciences_goals: Provide specialized educational and training programs.
Combine theoretical knowledge with practical training.
Equip students with essential practical skills.
Retrain unemployed individuals for new opportunities.

mission_goals.title: Mission and Goals
mission_goals.description: We are committed to a clear mission and defined objectives to achieve excellence in education and scientific research.
mission_items: Provide high-quality education with practical application to equip students with scientific and practical tools.
Promote creativity to develop innovative solutions for current and future challenges.
Conduct outstanding research that contributes to sustainable development.
Promote knowledge exchange with universities and specialized institutions.
goals_items: Qualify students to become specialists in their fields.
Support scientific research and innovation in various disciplines.
Enhance knowledge and understanding across academic fields.
Collaborate with universities and specialized institutions.

principles.title: Principles and Values
principles.description: We are committed to a set of principles and values that guide our work and direct our vision toward excellence.
principles_items: Enhancing mutual respect among faculty members, students, and staff.
Self-accountability, evaluation, responsibility, and continuous improvement.
values_items: Promoting transparency and accountability in all dealings.
Supporting the publication of peer-reviewed research.
Encouraging creative thinking to find practical solutions to present and future challenges.

recent_news.title: Latest News
recent_news.description: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and activities at Safwat Al-Safwa University.
recent_news.anniversary_description: Safwat Al-Safwa University celebrated its 10th anniversary in the presence of senior officials and academics. The event included honoring outstanding students and distinguished faculty members, as well as announcing new development projects aimed at enhancing educational and research quality.
recent_news.scholarship_program: Launch of the New Scholarship Program
recent_news.scholarship_description: The university announced the launch of a comprehensive scholarship program targeting outstanding students across all academic levels. The program covers full tuition fees, a monthly allowance, and free study materials for eligible students.
recent_news.lab_description: A series of advanced scientific laboratories were inaugurated in the Colleges of Medicine, Engineering, and Science, equipped with the latest technologies and devices to provide an exceptional learning and research environment for students and faculty members.

remote_learning.title: Online Learning
remote_learning.description: It enables students from different geographical regions to learn through modern educational tools, providing flexible learning opportunities for everyone at their own pace.
remote_learning.synchronous_description: Live interactive lectures through virtual classrooms via the Internet.
remote_learning.asynchronous_description: Pre-recorded lectures allowing students to access them at convenient times and participate in discussions.
remote_learning.benefits_description: Online Learning encourages self-learning and collaborative education without the need to attend traditional classrooms.
synchronous_features_list: No need to travel to the university campus.
Saves time and reduces study costs.
Direct interaction with the lecturer and peers.
Ability to ask questions and receive immediate answers.
Screen sharing and access to learning materials.
Lectures can be recorded for later review.
asynchronous_features_list: Students can study at their own suitable time.
Reviewing lectures as needed enhances understanding.
Full flexibility in scheduling study time.
Ability to pause and replay when necessary.
Saves time and effort spent on commuting.
general_benefits_list: Reduces costs associated with traditional education such as travel and accommodation.
Provides flexible learning opportunities for all.
Enables access to education from anywhere in the world.
Provides a comfortable and convenient learning environment.

research_center.title: Research and Studies Center
research_center.description: The center has established the first beacon for a better future, focusing on shaping individuals and societies to contribute to security, peace, and sustainable development, documented in 251 volumes.
research_center.scientific_research_description: The center conducts research and studies to achieve the university’s goals across various scientific and academic fields.
research_center.specialized_studies_description: We provide specialized studies in different fields to promote security, peace, and sustainable development within society.
research_center.scientific_publication_description: Publishing research and studies in 251 volumes to serve as a beacon of knowledge and science across disciplines.
research_goals_list: Produce high-quality scientific research that contributes to sustainable development.
Support researchers and academics across various disciplines.
Enhance research collaboration with local and international institutions.
studies_goals_list: Conduct in-depth studies on social issues.
publication_goals_list: Make research accessible to scholars and interested readers.
Contribute to building a knowledge-based society.

stats.title: University Statistics
stats.description: The university offers a leading educational experience that combines quality, knowledge, and scientific research, within an academic environment that fosters creativity and innovation to serve society locally and internationally.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive to achieve a comprehensive vision that places Safwat Al-Safwa University at the forefront.
vision.basic_vision_text: Providing high-quality education with continuous curriculum updates to align with scientific progress.
vision.continuous_education_text: Providing continuous learning opportunities for graduates and individuals who wish to keep up with rapid scientific developments.
vision.educational_environment_text: Creating an inspiring and innovative learning environment focused on interactive, self, and collaborative education.
vision.distance_learning_text: Enhancing Online Learning to access educational materials at the right time while reducing study costs.
vision.academic_integration_text: Horizontal and vertical integration of curricula with a semester-based study system.
vision.scientific_research_text: Conducting research and applied studies to solve current and anticipated challenges.
vision.leadership_preparation_text: Graduating highly qualified students with visionary perspectives across the university’s disciplines.
vision.international_cooperation_text: Collaborating with specialized universities and institutions to establish strong international partnerships.

faculty.title: Faculties
faculty.description: Discover the faculties that offer education at the university.

medicine.name: Faculty of Medicine
medicine.description: Aims to provide high-quality medical education, training, and practical experience before graduation, preparing students to deliver outstanding medical services with accountability for their outcomes.
goals: Provide high-quality medical education, training, and practice.
Support medical research and innovation.
Contribute to providing distinguished healthcare services.
specialties: Department of ENT (Ear, Nose, and Throat)
Department of Radiology and Medical Imaging
Department of Oncology and Nuclear Medicine
Department of Forensic Medicine and Toxicology
Department of Family and Community Medicine
Department of Physical Medicine, Rheumatology, and Rehabilitation

dentistry.name: Faculty of Dentistry
dentistry.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in oral and dental medicine, training, and practical application before graduation, preparing students to deliver excellent dental healthcare.
goals: Provide high-quality education in oral and dental medicine.
Support scientific research and innovation in dentistry.
Contribute to providing quality oral and dental healthcare.
specialties: Department of Basic and Clinical Oral Sciences
Department of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery

medical_sciences.name: Faculty of Medical Sciences
medical_sciences.description: Aims to provide high-quality education and training in medical sciences to prepare specialized professionals in various health disciplines.
goals: Provide high-quality education in medical sciences.
Support scientific research and innovation in medical fields.
Contribute to providing excellent healthcare.

engineering.name: Faculty of Engineering
engineering.description: Aims to provide high-quality engineering education, training, and practical experience before graduation to meet the demands of the job market.
goals: Provide high-quality engineering education, training, and practice.
Support research and innovation in engineering fields.
Contribute to community development and quality of life improvement.

management.name: Faculty of Management
management.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in business administration and accounting, including training and practical application before graduation to meet market needs.
goals: Provide high-quality education in business administration and accounting.
Develop leadership, management, and accounting skills among students.
Contribute to community development and quality of life improvement.

law.name: Faculty of Law
law.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in human rights and law, including training and practical application before graduation to qualify students for careers in the judiciary, legal practice, or consultancy.
goals: Provide high-quality education in human rights and law.
Develop legal knowledge and a deep understanding of laws and regulations.
Contribute to achieving justice through the application of legal knowledge.

humanities.name: Faculty of Humanities
humanities.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in fields such as Da’wah (Islamic preaching) and media, training, and practical experience before graduation to qualify students to understand and analyze human and cultural phenomena.
goals: Provide high-quality education in Da’wah and media.
Contribute to community development and enhancement of life quality.

community_development.name: Faculty of Community Development
community_development.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in community development and social work, with practical training to prepare students as professionals in social and community development.
goals: Provide high-quality education in community development and social work.
Contribute to community growth and quality of life improvement.

computer_science.name: Faculty of Computer Science and Information Systems
computer_science.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in computer science and information technology, with training and practical experience to prepare students as specialists in software development and information systems.
goals: Provide high-quality education in computer science and IT.
Prepare students to become professionals in software design and development.

languages_translation.name: Faculty of Languages and Translation
languages_translation.description: Aims to provide high-quality education in languages and translation, with training and practice to prepare students as experts in linguistic and translation fields.
goals: Provide high-quality education in languages and translation.
Enhance linguistic knowledge and deep cultural understanding.
Facilitate linguistic and cultural communication among different cultures.

application.title: Application Dates
application.description: Applications are open for three academic terms each year.

admissions.main_description: Safwat Al-Safwa University is committed to providing high-quality education to graduate outstanding students who can compete with those from the finest universities. We focus on interactive, self, and collaborative learning, along with research and training to instill knowledge.

step1.title: Submit the Application
step1.description: Fill out the online application form and submit all required documents through the university website

step2.title: Send Documents
step2.description: Send all required documents such as academic certificates, ID copies, and personal photos

step3.title: Personal Interview
step3.description: You will be invited for an interview with the admissions committee to assess your abilities and academic qualifications

step4.title: Receive Decision
step4.description: You will receive notification of acceptance or rejection via email or text message

academic_records.title: Academic Records
academic_records.description: High school certificate or equivalent with official transcripts

recommendation_letters.title: Recommendation Letters
recommendation_letters.description: Two recommendation letters from former teachers or academic supervisors

personal_statement.title: Personal Statement
personal_statement.description: Write a personal statement explaining your academic and career goals and reasons for choosing the university

standardized_tests.title: Standardized Tests
standardized_tests.description: Results of aptitude or English language tests as required by the program

request_info.title: Request Information
request_info.description: Have questions about the admission process or available programs? Contact us for more details

campus_visit.title: Campus Visit
campus_visit.description: Discover the university’s facilities and exceptional learning environment through an on-campus visit

ready_to_apply.title: Ready to Apply?
ready_to_apply.description: Start your academic journey with Safwat Al-Safwa University and become part of our distinguished community

benefits.b1: Provide effective education and sufficient training for success in a rapidly evolving world.
benefits.b2: Develop critical and creative thinking skills for problem-solving.
benefits.b4: Easily access job opportunities in both private and public sectors locally and globally.
